articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance of State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance of State Merited Chorus
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with service personnel of the KPA enjoyed an art performance given by the State Merited Chorus to mark the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Kim Jong Un appeared at the auditorium with Ri Sol Ju.
					
					 In the performance which started with serial songs "July 27, Our Victory Day", its performers sang high praises of the exploits of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, who aroused with his indomitable pluck and matchless guts the army and people of the DPRK to a nation-wide resistance for defending the country from huge aggressor forces' invasion and wiping out the enemy and created the myth of heroic Korea's war victory with his Juche-based military idea, superb strategies and tactics and distinguished leadership ability, thus honorably defending the freedom and independence of the country.
					
					 Through presentation of wartime songs, they lauded the spirit of the participants in the war who bravely fought for the freedom and independence of the country, united close around the great leader and the great Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The numbers of the performance included male choruses "Ode to General Kim Jong Un" and "Parade of Glory".
					
					 Appreciating the successful performance, Kim Jong Un expressed expectation and belief that the creators and artistes of the State Merited Chorus would as ever conduct their revolutionary and militant art activities to more inspiringly encourage the service personnel and civilians of the DPRK in the showdown with the U.S. and the all-out struggle for the victory in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Among the audience were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil and other commanding officers of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Leaves for Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Leaves for Egypt
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, left here by plane on Tuesday to take part in an opening ceremony of new Suez Canal at the invitation of Egyptian President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi.
					 He was seen off by Vice-President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-Premier Kim Tok Hun, Vice Foreign Minister Ri Kil Song and Charge d'Affaires ad Interim of the Egyptian embassy here Karim Mohamed Hossameldin Hassan Gouda.

articles.title: S. Korea, U.S. behind Rim Hyon Su's Activities against DPRK: Spokesman for Policy Department of NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korea, U.S. behind Rim Hyon Su's Activities against DPRK: Spokesman for Policy Department of NDC of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces have  kicked off another anti-DPRK racket by floating misinformation that Rim Hyon Su made a false confession under "duress and pressure" after being arrested in the DPRK for his subversive plots and activities against it. 
					 A spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA on Tuesday in this regard:
					
					 The day after a press conference was held with Rim, a spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Unification of south Korea claimed that the DPRK "illegally detained" Rim and "forced him to make a confession."
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities prodded the conservative media into spreading misinformation that the DPRK sought to "tighten the control over inhabitants and strengthen the social system" by "hyping up the threats" from outside. They went the lengths of asserting that the DPRK is resorting to "hostage diplomacy" as a tactical measure to take the initiative at the negotiations under the situation where the DPRK is playing a tug of war in the relations with south Korea and the U.S.
					
					 These remarks are nothing but sophism of those who have guilty conscience.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities and the U.S. have always been behind those forces engaged in extreme hostile acts against the DPRK in all realms of politics, economy and military. 
					
					 Rim acted an anti-communist maniac and a member of a shock force for the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north at the risk of his life under the mask of religion as he was under the dark tentacles of the south Korean puppet authorities and the U.S. 
					
					 He perpetrated such high treason as hurling mud at the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system, hatching a plot to bring down the state, creating distrust and bitterness toward the DPRK through sheer lies and fabrications, frauds, deception and speculations and conducting crafty operations to lure and abduct citizens of the DPRK, pursuant to the scenarios of south Korean puppet authorities and the U.S. for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities will not dare deny these facts.
					
					 Those guilty deserve punishment. 
					
					 It was not "unreasonable" but quite natural that the wicked elements were detected and arrested as they tried to destabilize and overthrow the DPRK. They admitted and confessed to their crimes, though belatedly. They did not do so under "duress."
					
					 The puppet forces are impudently falsifying this stark reality, a proof that they are diehard criminals steeped in plots and fabrications to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 The above-said sophism would only add to their crimes.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Parliamentary Group Leaves for Mongolia
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Parliamentary Group Leaves for Mongolia
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Parliamentary Group headed by Chairman Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, left here Tuesday to visit Mongolia.

articles.title: Delegation of Japan-DPRK Friendship Study for Juche Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Japan-DPRK Friendship Study for Juche Arrives
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan-DPRK friendship study for Juche headed by Masaji Ie, co-representative of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: School Youth and Children Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
School Youth and Children Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Mt. Paektu Area
						
 Hyesan, August 4 (KCNA) -- School youth and children across the DPRK started the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu in the run-up to the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The tour group made up of participants in the second National Conference of Young Models of Virtue and other exemplary school youth and children. It will tour revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu, Pochonbo and Lake Samji.
					
					 A ceremony of its start took place before the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo in Hyesan City Tuesday.
					
					 Its participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the monument and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A reporter and speakers called on all the members of the group to deeply grasp the undying revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary tradition of Paektu and prepare themselves to be vanguard fighters thoroughly carrying out the last instructions of the great leaders by regarding them as their lifeline.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the study tour kicked off.
					
					 The group was warmly seen off by people from all walks of life and school youth and children in the city.

articles.title: National Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Libraries Held
articles.content:
National Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Libraries Held
						
 Chongjin, August 4 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation in the field of libraries was held in Chongjin City on Aug 3 and 4 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea. 
					 Present there were teachers, researchers, librarians and postgraduates in the field of libraries from across the country including the Grand People's Study House and every provincial libraries. 
					
					 The participants heard valuable papers on successes and experience gained in developing libraries into centers for disseminating science and technology and operating them. 
					
					 A series of papers were highly appreciated for their feasibility and academic value.
					
					 The presentation also involved a lecture on the latest trend in the development of libraries and academic issues arising in turning libraries into centers for training scientific and technological talents and operating them.

articles.title: Construction of Mirae Scientists Street Progresses Apace
articles.content:
Construction of Mirae Scientists Street Progresses Apace
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The Mirae Scientists Street now under construction on the bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang has made its appearance.
					 Some days ago, the frame-working of a 53-storeyed apartment house came to an end, paving a way to complete the overall project by the appointed time.
					
					 The sky-scraper, symbolic of the second-phase project for the street, is very peculiar in an architectural view with its framework curved.
					
					 Soldier-builders finished the frame-working of this building in 66 days after its start on the ground.

articles.title: Friendly Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of Songdowon International Children's Camping
articles.content:
Friendly Meeting Held to Mark Anniversary of Songdowon International Children's Camping
						
 Wonsan, August 4 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting was held at the international friendship children's hall of the Songdowon International Children's Camp on Tuesday to mark the 30th anniversary of the camping.
					 Present there were campers of the 30th batch.
					
					 Jong Yong Won, vice-chairman of the C.C., the youth league, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 He said that schoolchildren in the DPRK are significantly celebrating the 30th anniversary of the camping while sharing friendly feelings with campers from different countries.
					
					 Campers of the DPRK and different countries gave an art performance.
					
					 In the evening they danced together, deepening friendship.

articles.title: Teaching Materials Donated to Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Teaching Materials Donated to Kim Il Sung University
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The Far Eastern Branch of the Russkiy Mir Foundation of Russia donated teaching materials to Kim Il Sung University on the occasion of the DPRK-Russia friendship year.
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy here conveyed teaching materials to the university on Tuesday.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the statue of leader Kim Jong Il at the university and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Alexandr Minaev, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Russian embassy here, conveyed the teaching materials donated by the Far Eastern Branch of the Russkiy Mir Foundation of Russia to an official of the university.

articles.title: DPRK's Offshore Farms Hit Yearly Targets
articles.content:
DPRK's Offshore Farms Hit Yearly Targets
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Signal achievements have been made in the fishery of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 According to data available, offshore farms under the Ministry of Fisheries hit their yearly targets in seaweed production by July.
					
					 The farms increased cultivation area by several hundred hectares and cultivated high-yield species of tangle and laver.
					
					 The Pupho Offshore Farm largely raised the production of seedlings to supply them to other farms across the country.
					
					 The Kim Chaek Fishery Station on the east coast turned out 1.3 times more tangle than the previous year by applying latest technologies.

articles.title: Park Chung-hee and His Daughter Accused of Sycophancy toward Japan
articles.content:
Park Chung-hee and His Daughter Accused of Sycophancy toward Japan
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Hankuk Ilbo, a daily of south Korea, recently disclosed the sordid nexus between traitor Park Chung-hee, father of the present puppet chief executive of south Korea, and the Mitsubishi Group of Japan.
					 According to it, Park Chung-hee, during the "presidential election" held in 1963 in the wake of his seizure of power through "May 16 military coup", received one million U.S. dollars from Mitsubishi as "political fund".
					
					 Moreover, he left arteries of the south Korean economy to the tender mercy of Mitsubishi, praising the then director of the Mitsubishi trading firm as an "upright man of great administrative ability."
					
					 As a result, the then Mitsubishi Group had virtually monopolized as early as in the 1960s major projects for "economic development" in south Korea including the construction of Phohang Iron Works. Consequently, the south Korean industry was reduced to a dependent sub-contract industry and a processing base bringing huge profits to the Group.
					
					 Lurking behind the "economic cooperation" between the Park Chung-hee regime and Mitsubishi was a political and business nexus, the daily notes, adding that a lot of things still remain shrouded in mists.
					
					 This information brought to light the true colors of Park Chung-hee as a pro-Japanese lackey.
					
					 Mitsubishi should have been sternly punished together with war criminals in the very day of Japan's defeat for the crimes it perpetrated by actively supporting the regime's war of aggression and inflicting untold pain and damage upon Koreans.
					
					 But traitor Park made no scruple of joining hands with Mitsubishi in a bid to stay in power and meet his personal interests, far from forcing it to make apology and reparation for the crimes.
					
					 Moreover, Park also received 1.2 million U.S. dollars from the Mitsui Group during the 1963 "presidential election" and billions of yen from Japanese businesses during the 1971 "presidential election" as "political fund".
					
					 He committed an act of treachery by concluding a shackling "agreement" with Japan in 1965, which helped nearly 100 businesses and agencies of the latter strike their roots among the economic arteries of south Korea in 1966.
					
					 When recalling the fact that Mitsubishi plundered resources worth at least 32. 1 million U.S. dollars in south Korea in 1970 alone, it is not hard to guess how big profits all the Japanese businesses in south Korea have raked up there so far.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is as wicked traitor as her father.
					
					Park Geun Hye is openly talking about "normalization of relations" with Japan which has desperately refused to make an apology and reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 She is behaving quite contrary to the enmity running high among all Koreans toward Japan, saying "this year would be a significant one for improving south Korea-Japan relations."
					
					 The south Korean regime did not utter even a word of protest when Japanese Prime Minister Abe was so arrogant as to bluster that the issue of comfort women can be settled by paying about three hundred million yen and south Korea would hold out its hands first if Japan remains tough in its stand. It also kept mum when Japan conducted open diplomacy to have its past industrial establishments registered as world cultural heritages though a lot of Koreans were forced to do slave labor there.
					
					 Recently, Mitsubishi refused to make reparation for the loss suffered by Koreans who had been forced to do slave labor during the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea, asserting "compensation had already been made through the conclusion of the 1965 agreement on claims."
					
					 However, the Park Geun Hye regime is keeping mum about it.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the regime began sharing even military information about the DPRK with Japan, holding in real earnest meetings of various fields including diplomacy, military and economy with Japan at the instigation of the U.S.
					
					 The regime's sycophancy toward Japan is, indeed, the most humiliating act of sycophancy and hideous act of treachery putting into the shade not only traitor Park Chung-hee but also the five traitors of 1905.
					
					 As Hankuk Ilbo took issue with the past conservative ruler's sycophancy toward Japan, terming it a "matter that should not be overlooked", what Park Chung-hee and Park Geun Hye committed should be strictly investigated.
					
					 They should be sternly punished by the nation for kissing Japan, the sworn enemy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu, Spirit of Blizzards of Paektu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu, Spirit of Blizzards of Paektu
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, which is an undying soul of Korea, serves as the eternal lifeline of Juche Korea and its best mental treasure, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Juche Korea would be unthinkable apart from the revolutionary spirit which came into existence and became stronger amid the blizzards of Paektu just as it would be impossible to think about Mt. Paektu without the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 This spirit is, in essence, an unyielding offensive spirit of braving obstacles and difficulties and a staunch spirit of rising up and fighting it out no matter how often one may fall.
					
					 This spirit is the strongest weapon for defending the country that has helped firmly defend the dignity and destiny of Juche Korea. 
					
					 The blizzards of Paektu prove truth that national sovereignty is what one should not get usurped though one may die. It also instills pluck and courage to defend the sovereignty from the enemies' moves though one may die thousands of times.
					
					 Self-respect of the Paektusan nation to build the most wonderful people's country in the world runs through the spirit of blizzards of Paektu now prevailing in Korea.
					
					 The eternal spirit of Korea is the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu shining by the immortal soul of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This spirit shines as a powerful ideological and moral weapon and the great revolutionary spirit that our party and people should hold fast to in the struggle for achieving the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of Kim Jong Un to glorify Songun Korea in the world and maintain the lifeline of the revolution in this spirit.
					
					 This spirit brought about Korea's liberation and war victory by defeating the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's era. It will wipe out the U.S. imperialists, sworn enemy of the Korean people, on the earth and bring about great event of achieving the country's reunification in Kim Jong Un's era.
					
					 The final victory is in store for the Korean people as the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu push them forward.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Invariably Holding Fast to Great Leaders' Idea and Line of National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Invariably Holding Fast to Great Leaders' Idea and Line of National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates an article to the 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification."
					 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the immortal feats President Kim Il Sung performed for the cause of national reunification.
					
					 It also formulates the three principles of national reunification, 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and clarifies the tasks and ways for achieving national reunification based on them.
					
					 The work deeply moved all Koreans for Kim Jong Il's transparent patriotism represented in every word of the work and for the scientific accuracy and feasibility of its idea and theory, and their validity and great vitality have been fully displayed in the movement for national reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, landmarks for national reunification in the new century, were adopted to put the inter-Korean relations on the orbit of reconciliation and reunification from evil cycle of antagonism and confrontation in which they were locked.
					
					 The idea and line of national reunification advanced by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il serve as the immortal banner to be invariably held fast to despite change of the times and any situation.
					
					 There can never be any change in the basic principle of national reunification indicated by the great leaders no matter how the situation and circumstances may change.
					
					 The anti-reunification forces at home and abroad have gone to the extremes in their moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK. This situation calls for further consolidating the driving force of national reunification.
					
					 Unshakable is the will of all Koreans to carry out the great leaders' last instructions for national reunification without fail despite tense situation and vicious challenge by anti-reunification forces.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. Not to Forget Its History of Defeat in Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. Not to Forget Its History of Defeat in Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, U.S. politicians submitted to Congress a draft resolution which calls for erecting a monument to the American service members who met ignominious deaths after being dispatched to south Korea in the post-war period.
					 The drafters praised those who were reported missing or dead during clashes with the DPRK as "brave fighters" and called for erecting a monument to them in the Ellington National Cemetery.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The whole history of confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. shows that the former has always won victories but the latter has always sustained setbacks.
					
					 The U.S. has suffered disgrace only in the eyes of the world, and this is an undeniable reality.
					
					 The article cites facts that in the draft resolution the U.S. claimed that the DPRK violated the Armistice Agreement and, consequently, unceasing clashes caused GI casualties.
					
					 Such foolish farce being staged by the U.S. only brings into bolder relief the true colors of the poor loser, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 What matters is why the U.S. is staging such clumsy burlesque. Lurking behind it is a cynical ploy to implant the anti-DPRK sentiment into the minds of Americans and hurl them into shambles of war to realize its ambition for aggression.
					
					 This is, however, a daydream.
					
					 Aggressors would only meet death as proved by the history of confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop foolish behavior, drawing a lesson from its history of defeat in the standoff with the DPRK.

articles.title: Japanese People Do Not Want Disaster of War: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Japanese People Do Not Want Disaster of War: Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- About 150 Japanese scholars held a press conference in Tokyo on July 20 and made public a statement in protest against the government's push for the adoption of security bills. 10 000 scholars and researchers voiced support for the stand of this scholars group. They had already staged a protest action outside the Diet building.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary terms it a political splash caused by the unreasonable attitude of the Japanese ruling forces who made a U-turn to the path of war from peace.
					
					 They are busied themselves adopting the security bills, a reactionary act of turning Japan back to its inglorious past, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The Japanese authorities, however, are craftily scheming to realize their ambition for reinvasion, oblivious of the lesson of history.
					
					 What matters is who will suffer from massive disaster in case Japan ignites a war of aggression once again. Needless to say, the Japanese people will suffer from the disaster.
					
					 That is why the Japanese people are cursing the government authorities and strongly opposing war.
					
					 They do not want disaster of war again nor the final ruin of the country.
					
					 They are trying to stop the government from doing away the pacifist constitution and bringing catastrophic disaster to the country.
					
					 The Japanese government authorities should not remain a passive onlooker at the ever-worsening situation but think twice.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime Termed Chief Culprit of Illegal Hacking Case
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime Termed Chief Culprit of Illegal Hacking Case
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- An editorial disclosing the chief culprit of the illegal hacking case was posted on the south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo on Aug. 2.
					 The editorial said it was proved that the Intelligence Service's purchase of a hacking program coincided with 2012 elections and the program was used for surveillance over people.
					
					 The IS hyped its staff member's suicide in a bid to hush up the hacking case but it resulted in increasing suspicions, the editorial noted.
					
					 Park Geun Hye's force seized power by architecting power-involved elections on Dec. 19, 2012, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 It demanded the Park regime step down at once as it greatly benefited from the IS's hacking case and commanded and ordered illegal hacking.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Introduced by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech Introduced by Swiss Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article on their websites on July 28.
					 The article said:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un made a congratulatory speech at the 4th National Conference of War Veterans held in Pyongyang on July 25 on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 His speech is an expression of the highest tribute to the heroes who fought at the risk of their lives in the war against the U.S. aggression.
					
					 He said that July 27 is the second Day of Liberation when the Korean people defended with honor their country's dignity and sovereignty from the brigandish aggression by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea will bring the confrontation with the imperialists including the U.S. to a victorious conclusion and hasten the ultimate victory of the Korean revolution by dint of the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The congratulatory speech made by Kim Jong Un is a historic declaration of the victors.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Kuwaiti Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Kuwaiti Paper
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The first part of President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Conclusion of the Armistice Agreement" was carried by the Kuwaiti paper Kuwait Times on July 28.

articles.title: DPRK's V-Day Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's V-Day Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and film shows at the Foreign Relations Department of the National Defense Ministry of Vietnam and the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples from July 21 to 24 on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Korean films such as "Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum" were shown at the film shows.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that the Korean army and people worked a historical miracle of defeating the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces in a three-year war thanks to the outstanding strategies and tactics, original military war methods and sophisticated commanding arts of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Members of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said that the U.S. imperialists talked big about their "victory" when provoking the Korean war by mobilizing huge aggression troops and war equipment in the 1950s but they faced big losses and suffered a shameful defeat. Yet, they have consistently pursued the ambition for world domination, turning the Korean peninsula into a hotspot, the members added.
					
					 A man in charge of political affairs of the Foreign Relations Department of the National Defense Ministry of Vietnam said that his party and government always remember the President's material aid and moral support for his country in its harshest days.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at a seminar held in Nigeria.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam parte de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam parte de Pyongyang
						
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, partio el dia 4 de esta capital por via aerea para asistir a la ceremonia inaugural del nuevo Canal de Suez cumplimentando una invitacion de Su Excelencia Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, presidente  de la Republica Arabe de Egipto. 
					Le despidieron el vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS, Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Kim Tok Hun, el vicecanciller Ri Kil Song y el encargado de negocios a.i. egipcio acreditado en Corea, Karim Mohamed Hossameldin Hassan Gouda.

articles.title: DP de CDN califica a EE.UU. y Sur de Corea de guias traseras de Rim Hyon Su
articles.content:
DP de CDN califica a EE.UU. y Sur de Corea de guias traseras de Rim Hyon Su
						
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- Ahora los titeres surcoreanos arman nuevo alboroto de hostilidad a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea enganando la opinion publica como si la confesion de Rim Hyon Su, detenido por su crimen de haber actuado como brigada de choque del complot de derrocamiento anti-RPDC, se debio a la "coercion" y "presion" de alguien. 
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC dio el dia 4 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					
					El dia siguiente de la rueda de prensa sobre el crimen de Rim, el portavoz del Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea dijo que la RPDC "retuvo injustamente" al pastor residente en Canada y le "obligo a confesar". 
					
					A instigacion de las autoridades surcoreanas, los medios conservadores surcoreanos divulgan el rumor de que el Norte de Corea intenta intensificar la "supervision de habitantes" y "consolidar el sistema" mediante la "exacerbacion de la amenaza" desde el exterior y recurre a la "diplomacia de rehenes" como una medida tactica para tomar la iniciativa en las negociaciones en la situacion actual en que se encuentran en la competencia de fuerza las relaciones intercoreanas y las RPDC-EE.UU.
					
					Tales disparates no pasan de ser una sofisteria de los que estan inquietados por sus crimenes. 
					
					Detras de todas las acciones hostiles a la RPDC que se cometen en todas las esferas como la politica, la economia y los asuntos militares estan siempre las autoridades surcoreanas y EE.UU.
					
					Bajo el amparo de las autoridades surcoreanas y EE.UU., Rim Hyon Su se ha convertido en un maniaco anticomunista y de enfrentamiento fratricida con la mascara de religioso. 
					
					La calumnia a la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC, el complot de derrocamiento de Estado, el fomento de la desconfianza y hostilidad a la RPDC con los fraudes y estafas, el secuestro de los moradores norcoreanos y otros crimenes cometidos por Rim son todos orquestados por el guion de complots anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea y EE.UU.
					
					No lo podrian negar las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Los delincuentes deben ser castigados. 
					
					Es natural el descubrimiento y detencion de los elementos conflictivos que intentaban desintegrar y derrocar la RPDC. 
					
					Y el reconocimiento y confesion de ellos sobre sus crimenes son autocritica sincera. 
					
					Lejos de reconocerlo, los titeres surcoreanos, acostumbrados a los complots, inducen en error la opinion publica.
					
					Si sueltan las sofisterias tergiversando la verdad, se agrandaran mas sus crimenes.

articles.title: Jovenes y ninos escolares recorren zona revolucionaria del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Jovenes y ninos escolares recorren zona revolucionaria del monte Paektu
						
Hyesan, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, los jovenes y ninos escolares iniciaron el recorrido por los lugares de batalla revolucionaria en la zona del monte Paektu.
					Los participantes en la II conferencia nacional de los vanguardias jovenes en conductas loables y otros jovenes y ninos escolares ejemplares visitaran el monte Paektu, Pochonbo y los lugares de batalla revolucionaria en alrededor del lago Samji.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 4 el acto de partida ante el Monumento a la Victoria en la Batalla de Pochonbo situada en la ciudad de Hyesan.
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras depositar un cesto y ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguida en el Monumento.
					
					En el acto hubo informe e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que en esta ocasion todos los participantes deben prepararse como vanguardistas que asimilan profundamente las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias de los grandes Lideres y las tradiciones revolucionarias del Paektu y materializan sin falta sus legados tomandolos como linea de vida.
					
					Terminado el acto, los concurrentes comenzaron la marcha.
					
					Ellos fueron objeto de la calurosa despedida de los trabajadores de distintos estratos y los jovenes y ninos escolares de la ciudad de Hyesan.

articles.title: Presentacion nacional de ciencias y tecnicas de la rama de biblioteca
articles.content:
Presentacion nacional de ciencias y tecnicas de la rama de biblioteca 
						
Chongjin, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 3 y 4 en la ciudad de Chongjin la presentacion nacional de ciencias y tecnicas de la rama de biblioteca bajo auspicios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los profesores, investigadores, bibliotecarios y cursantes de instituto doctoral del Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo, las bibliotecas provinciales y las ramas interesadas.
					
					Fueron publicadas las disertaciones valiosas que muestran los exitos y las experiencias logrados en el proceso de acondicionar y gestionar las bibliotecas como base de divulgacion de ciencia y tecnica.
					
					En la ocasion hubo la conferencia sobre la tendencia del desarrollo de las bibliotecas y los asuntos academicos para preparar y gestionarlas como bases de la formacion de los personales cientifico-tecnicos.

articles.title: Culminada obra de armazon de vivienda de 53 pisos
articles.content:
Culminada obra de armazon de vivienda de 53 pisos
						
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los constructores militares participantes en la construccion de la avenida de cientificos Mirae situada a la orilla del pintoresco rio Taedong de Pyongyang acabaron de terminar durante 66 dias la obra de  armazon de rascacielos de 53 pisos.
					Siendo simbolo de la construccion de la segunda etapa de la avenida de cientificos Mirae el edificio se construyo en forma muy particular en lo arquitectonico nunca visto en Corea.
					
					El armazon tiene la forma no recta sino curvilinea, razon por la cual es muy dificil la obra y complicada la estructura.
					
					La cantidad de la obra y los materiales requeridos es unas veces mas que otros rascacielos ordinarios.
					
					Los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea crearon de nuevo la velocidad de construccion sin precedentes con la determinacion de concluir sin falta la construccion asumida hasta la fecha fijada.
					
					Cada dia fue consumido el cemento de cientos de toneladas, lo cual muestra la velocidad y el ambito de la construccion.
					
					De esta manera, se abrio la brecha para acabar perfectamente la obra del edificio moderno y concluir a tiempo la construccion general de la avenida.

articles.title: Encuentro de amistad en Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon
articles.content:
Encuentro de amistad en Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon
						
Wonsan, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la Casa Infantil de Amistad del citado Campamento el encuentro de amistad dedicado al 30o aniversario del campismo internacional de ninos de Songdonwon.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los campistas del XXX campismo internacional de ninos de Songdowon.
					
					El discurso de felicitacion estuvo a cargo del vicepresidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jong Yong Won.
					
					El orador dijo que los ninos escolares coreanos conmemoran significativamente el 30o aniversario del campismo arriba mencionado profundizando el sentimiento de amistad con los  campistas de varios paises.
					
					Acto seguido, se ofrecio una funcion de piezas artisticas de los campistas de Corea y varios paises.
					
					Los participantes pasaron con alegria la noche de campismo bailando juntos al compas de la musica.
